name: Infetterence
description:
Controls:
Arrow keys - Movement

You are agoraphobic and must do your grocery shopping  while avoiding people as much as possible. Get your groceries by walking into the highlighted area. Collect as many as you can before your stress bar fills up. Stress fills up over time, it fills up significantly faster if you are in view of someone.

Game made in three hours as a submission for Trijam #152. All assets aside from the color palette were made by me.

Theme: Leave me alone!

Tools used:
Godot
LMMS
Krita

Color pallette: Sweet16
https://lospec.com/palette-list/sweetie-16/
